gram-furniture-1.title: Gram Furniture
gram-furniture-1.subtitle: Limited Edition
gram-furniture-1.description: Obtained frome the finest and rarest leather the gram dining set is a must have for your Living area.

descriptions.title: Indoor Use Only
descriptions.description: Experience the future of interior design as our AI creates tailored recommendations from real market options. Select from three variations of furnished and decorated spaces, with the flexibility to add additional furniture and pieces. Easily finalize your selections and have everything shipped directly to your home, simplifying the process of transforming your space.
